Articles.Content:
My Second Aircraft C:

I designed it to be cargo plane, but my idea doesn't seem so good. I tried to put on additional fuel tanks on the wing tips and they just fell off.

On the prototype, if you fluttered the wings, they would come off. So I added structs to counteract that problem.

This is it in the SPH

And here is the download is usual

http://www./?jt8pk3e2iv5306f

Tell me what you think of it down below
